name: Chefman Electric Panini Press Grill and Gourmet Sandwich Maker w/ Non-Stick Coated Plates, Opens 180 Degrees to Fit Any Type or Size Food, Dishwasher Safe Removable Drip Tray, Stainless Steel/Black
short_description: HUNGRY FOR A SANDWICH? With just the push of a button, this Grill-Panini Press Combo can be used to press your custom sandwich or open at 180 degrees for grilling burgers, steaks, veggies and anything else you’re craving quickly and easily! Use it as a panini press for perfectly crisped bread- no cooking spray required. ADJUSTABLE FOR ANY OCCASION: Floating hinge adjusts to accommodate any size sandwich – thick or thin. Closed cooking surface of 5.5'' x 8.75'' is ideal for two sandwiches, while lay-flat surface of 10'' x 8.75'' can accommodate a variety of food. Great for a quick meal, summer party or a family event. COMPACT SIZE: Ideal for small kitchen spaces, dorm rooms, offices, and even bringing on road trips! The compact size takes up little counter or shelf space making storing your contact grill easy. EASY CLEANING: The tilt-up, skid resistant feet allow the grease to run to the drain at the back of the closed panini maker. The non-stick coated grill plates and removable drip tray makes for effortless cleaning. RESOURCES: UL approved with advanced safety technology for long lasting durability, & 1-year assurance provided by Chefman, so you can purchase worry-free - we've got your back! For information on how to use your product, scroll down for a PDF User Guide. 1000 Watts/120 Volts - RJ02-180
product_description: A Bistro in your own kitchen! When it comes to making a memorable meal, it’s all about the flavor and details - from the gooey, melted cheese to the crusty, warmed bread with those enticing grill marks. With the Chef man Panini press Grill and gourmet sandwich maker, you can make perfectly pressed Panini's right at home. The floating hinge adjusts to press the thinnest grilled cheese to the most stuffed burgers. You aren’t just limited to sandwiches and Panini's - this grill accommodates all varieties of delicious food. There’s no limit to your cooking creativity! Need to grill steak? Open the grill to lay flat at 180° with just the push of a button. The closed cooking surface is 5. 5'' X 8. 75'' Making it ideal for two sandwiches or 1 Panini, while lay-flat surface of 10'' X 8. 75'' Is stellar for grilling burgers, fish, chicken, vegetables and more! Clean-up is just as quick and easy with its sloped design so grease drips to the back. The removable drip tray and non-stick plates make it easy to remove excess food and grease. Its compact size takes up little counter or shelf space making storing your contact grill easy and makes this an ideal appliance for small kitchen spaces, dorm rooms, offices, and even bringing on Road trips! With the Chef man Panini press Grill and gourmet sandwich maker you can make tasty sandwiches, grilled dishes and more right in the Comfort of your own home without breaking a sweat! No master sandwich maker skills required.Wattage : 120V, 1400W.Easy to clean :Non-stick plates and dishwasher-safe drip tray allow for easy and fast cleanup.

name: Breville BGR700BSS Sear and Press Grill, Brushed Stainless Steel
short_description: The Breville Sear and Press Grill creates customized cooking environments to precisely grill your favorite foods; Pre-programmed, one-touch presets include Panini, Burger and Sear functionalities; Convenient shortcuts mean less time in the kitchen OPEN FLAT BBQ MODE: Open grill flat for a 240 square inch grilling and griddle surface; Grill steaks, burgers or seafood; Cook delicious eggs and pancakes; Indoor grill's removable drip tray works in BBQ or contact mode, catching fat while cooking INDEPENDENT PLATE TEMPERATURE CONTROL: Take command with electronic temperature control on each plate; Use BBQ mode to independently cook different foods requiring different temperatures; Endless food combinations with this electric grill and griddle REVERSIBLE CERAMIC GRILL AND GRIDDLE PLATES: Non-stick and natural coating enable dual-sided grilling convenience in your own home kitchen; With hotter temperatures, ceramic plates allow more browning, better crust and are completely PFOA and PTFE free WAFFLE PLATES COMPATIBLE: Premium quick release non-stick coating ceramic waffle plates (sold separately) add versatility to your grill; No-mess moat design feature prevents waffle batter from spilling onto your kitchen countertop; Dishwasher safe EASY TO CLEAN KITCHEN APPLIANCE: PFOA free and non-stick plates allow for easy hand cleaning; You can also pop the plates out and put them in the dishwasher for extra convenience; Spend less time cleaning and more time grilling tasty vegetables and meats THREE FLEXIBLE SETTINGS: Breville grill offers three distinct settings to extend the capabilities of your appliance; Access a practical panini press with Panini mode, a precise hamburger cooker with Burger, and add delicious sear to your meal with Sear
product_description: Breville BGR700BSS Sear and Press Grill, Brushed Stainless Steel

name: Cuisinart GR-6S Contact Griddler with Smoke-Less Mode
short_description: Smoke-less Mode features- Preset for food groups include beef, poultry, fish and pork Fold out front foot extension and additional top plate position for grease drainage Newly designed plates for improved grease management LCD Display and Digital Controls Adjustable temperatures from 175-425°F plus a Sear Function DuoControl Heating Advantage- provides independent temperature control for upper and lower plates Smokeless grill, contact grill, panini press, full grill, full griddle, and half grill/half griddle
product_description: Introducing the first Smoke-less Contact Griddler, an innovative kitchen essential that makes it easy to cook delicious grilled meals indoors—without all the smoke. Specially designed plates reduce grease while precision temperature control maintains just the right heat for grilling beef, poultry, fish, and pork to perfection, with maximum flavor and minimal smoke. Engineered especially for smoke-less indoor cooking of grilled favorites all year round, this one-of-a-kind appliance also includes all the Griddler features home chefs love. And because there’s a removable drip tray and the plates are nonstick and dishwasher safe, cleanups are a breeze.

name: Chefman Panini Press Grill and Gourmet Sandwich Maker Non-Stick Coated Plates, Opens 180 Degrees to Fit Any Type or Size of Food, Stainless Steel Surface and Removable Drip Tray, 4 Slice, Black

name: Hamilton Beach Panini Press Sandwich Maker & Electric Indoor Grill with Locking Lid, Opens 180 Degrees for any Thickness for Quesadillas, Burgers & More, Nonstick 8" x 10" Grids, Chrome (25460AG)
short_description: GREAT FOR PANINIS AND MORE: Use this panini press to try savory sandwiches, quesadillas, and sweet fruit turnovers. Use the lock top lid to warm personal pizzas or open-face sandwiches. FLOATING LID: This hot sandwich maker features a café-style floating lid that evenly presses any size sandwich. NO NEED TO FLIP: Nonstick top and bottom panini press grids heat and brown the sandwich, giving you warm, crisp results. GREEN MEANS GO: For best results, preheat sandwich maker 6 minutes before use. Built-in ready light will turn green when the press is ready to cook your sandwich. TOP LID LOCK: Lock panini press lid to create an easy bruschetta or open-face sandwiches. UPRIGHT STORAGE: Easily fits in your kitchen cabinet or discreetly on your countertop STYLISH CHROME FINISH: Panini press looks great on any counter

name: George Foreman 4-Serving Removable Plate Electric Grill and Panini Press, George Tough Non-Stick Coating, Drip Tray Catches Grease, Black
short_description: ADVANCED GEORGE TOUGH NONSTICK COATING: There’s a lot to love about this nonstick coating. It’s 3x¹ more durable, easy to clean, and removes the need for butter and oil. 35% FASTER HEATING: Less time heating, more time eating.The improved heating elements preheat 35% faster to get you from plug-in to plate in record time. REMOVABLE GRILL PLATES: Easy cleanup is essential, and that’s what the removable grill plates are all about. Pop them in the dishwasher after grilling and they’ll be ready to go for your next meal. 4 SERVINGS: Tight on kitchen space? The 60-square inch grill is the most popular George Foreman Grill, with space for a tasty main course for four, or a complete meal with veggies and other sides. INCLUDED COMPONENTS: Dishwasher Safe Removable Plates
product_description: This is how real fast food is made. The George Foreman 4-Serving Removable Plate Electric Grill and Panini Press heats up 35% faster to deliver hot, tasty food that’s made your way. Cleanup is just as fast thanks to the dishwasher-safe removable plates. The grill comes with the George Tough nonstick coating that holds up through cooking and cleaning, alike. The sloped grilling surface drains up to 42% of fat, making for light, healthy cooking of all your favorite meats. This is the must-have grill for couples or small families who want easy, delicious meals.

name: GreenPan 6-in-1 Multifunction Removable Plate Indoor Grill & Electric Griddle, Diamond Infused PFAS Free Ceramic Nonstick Reversible Plates, Opens Flat, Adjustable Temp, Panini Press, Black
short_description: 6-IN-1 MULTI-GRILL: contact grill, contact griddle, panini press, mixed grill/griddle, open grill, and open griddle—it’s a full short-order kitchen in one place THERMOLON VOLT: a ceramic nonstick coating specially designed to withstand the strain of modern appliances—this diamond-infused ceramic nonstick is extra tough, cleans easily, and makes any meal healthier TOXIN-FREE: Our healthy ceramic nonstick coating is manufactured without the use of PFAS, PFOA, lead or cadmium REVERSIBLE PLATES: grill and griddle plates make it easy to switch things up for your meal LAY-FLAT DESIGN: open the Grill & Griddle flat for extra room and multi-surface grilling CONTROL YOUR HEAT: Heat top and bottom plates individually or both at the same time for incredible searing GET MAXIMUM CONTACT: Cover height adjusts automatically to accommodate your food
product_description: Discover a new way to maximize your countertop cooking with the GreenPan Grill & Griddle. Reversible grill and griddle plates deliver plenty of options to customize your cooking experience. Fold it in half to get classic melts, paninis, burgers, and more! The plates adjust for maximum contact to ensure your food cooks evenly. It even lays flat to deliver double space or so you can use a grill and griddle at the same time! The best part? The Grill and Griddle features Thermolon™ Volt, a ceramic nonstick coating specially designed to withstand the strain of modern appliances. This diamond-infused ceramic nonstick coating is made specially for kitchen appliances, so this device wipes clean and the plates are even dishwasher safe for tough messes.

name: De'Longhi America CGH1020D Livenza All Day Combination Contact Grill and Open Barbecue, Stainless Steel
short_description: 5 cooking functions: contact grill & Panini press, open full grill, open full griddle, half grill half griddle Removable, dishwasher safe die-cast plates with embedded heating elements Digital control LED panel with two knobs to set the temperature control of the two plates Large cooking surface of 14.5in x 9in (doubles to 14.5in x 18in once opened) Hanging self adjustable hinge won't crush small sandwiches or large pieces of meat while still cooking it through Includes 1 set of Grill plates, 1 set of Griddle plates, Oil Drip Cup and Cleaning Tool
product_description: For home cooks looking to maximize counter space while still being able to flex their cooking chops in the kitchen, the De'Longhi Livenza All-Day Grill with FlexPress System, model CGH1020D, is the perfect appliance. This unique grill features interchangeable sets of high performance grill and griddle plates to help you cook efficiently and healthy - bringing out the best flavors in delicious grilled meats and vegetables and breakfast favorites such as pancakes and bacon. With the unique FlexPress System, cook in a variety of ways such as contact grill, Panini press, full grill, full griddle and half grill/half griddle or even waffle mode (with plates purchased separately), eliminating the need for additional appliances. The Livenza All-Day Grill includes embedded heating elements, which prevent hotspots for a more even cooking process, as well as an integrated drip tray for healthier grilling. The hanging self-adjustable hinge with cool touch handles offers you many different choices for cooking, including the perfect press, without too much pressure, when in the contact setting. The extra wide 9"x15" cooking surface allows you to make multiple dishes for a large family or entertaining. The dedicated app offers a variety of cooking tips and recipes to make any home chef feel like a professional.

name: Panini Press Grill Sandwich Maker with Removable Plates, 5 in 1 Smokeless Indoor Grill & Griddle with Meat Thermometer, CATTLEMAN CUISINE Electric Contact Grills for Kitchen, Stainless Steel, 1600W
short_description: 【5 in 1 Countertop Electric Grills】CATTLEMAN CUISINE indoor grill can be used as contact grill, grill cheese sandwich maker, full grill, full griddle, or half grill/half griddle for different cooking needs in one machine. The double damping hinge structure allows 180° rotation of the lid, better for different thicknesses of food. No additional gears to adjust the height, our panini grill can be stopped at any angle within 180° with one-hand operation. 【Meat Thermometer】No need to cut the food check inside, or constantly probe them by using an instant-read thermometer. Our electric flat top grill comes with a smart meat thermometer and can set the probe function independently, there are 5 setting modes. When the food reaches the set temperature, it will beep to remind you. Enable intelligent temperature control and cooking. It is the best party supplies for family gatherings and new year celebration. 【Nonstick grill griddle with removable plates & Easy to Clean】2 grill plates are non-stick coated and removable, just press the button to remove them, easy to operate and can clean in dishwasher. Our digital multi plates waffle grill are double-sided. One side is smooth for cooking pancakes, tortillas or etc. Another side is striped for cooking steak, BBQ or etc. Easy to change sides for your cooking needs. 【Easy to Use & Humanized Design】Operate-friendly buttons and knob controls, the LCD display clearly shows the independent display of temperature and time. The foldable bracket allows cooking grease to flow into the drip tray faster, reducing grease smoke. The drip tray is detachable for easy cleaning. Our stainless steel flat cuban sandwich press is the best choice for house warming gift. 【Package List】1x contact grill with US plug, 1x smart probe, 2x reversible grill plate, 1x manual. Our electric contact grill and griddle are suitable for various occasions, like kitchen countertops, RV, camping, and family BBQ. One double waffle maker can solve your three meals a day. Note: If you want to switch the temperature display mode, just press and hold the knob for 5 seconds in standby mode. It is recommended to put food in after preheating. Merge two grill plates together can speed up the preheating. The preheating function can make the food more abundant and delicious during the formal frying and roasting process. When the temperature is set too high, the preheating time may be long. We suggest setting it to 400F first and then continue to increase the temperature when frying. Another point worth noting is that when the preheating is completed, a tone will go off, the screen flashes to display "pre", while during the preheating process, pre is displayed statically.

name: George Foreman 2-Serving Classic Plate Electric Indoor Grill and Panini Press, Black, GRS040B
short_description: 2 Servings - Tight on countertop space? This grill is your answer. It fits two servings of your grilled favorites, and it’s perfect for small apartments and couples. New Space-Saving Design* - With a low profile and vertical storage capabilities, it’s simple to fit the grill in small spaces on your countertop or in the cupboard. Advanced George Tough Nonstick Coating - There’s a lot to love about this nonstick coating. It’s 3x more durable**, easy to clean, and removes the need for butter and oil. Adjustable Grilling Angle - Set the grill at an angle to remove excess fat during grilling, or put it flat for panini and other toasting tasks. The hinged grill legs are simple to adjust. Exclusive Fat-Removing Slope - It’s the sure sign of a George Foreman Grill. The sloped grilling surface helps remove excess fat for tasty meals and healthy grilling. Perfect for individuals or couples
product_description: This compact grill just got even better for small kitchens! The George Foreman® 2-Serving Classic Plate Electric Indoor Grill and Panini Press takes up 34% less space*, so you can store it in tight spots on the countertop or in the cupboard. Classic grill plates feature the Advanced George Tough™ nonstick coating that’s easy to clean, is 3x more durable**, and easy to clean. Plus, the adjustable cooking angle lets you tilt to remove excess fat during grilling, and set it flat for toasting panini. Top and bottom grill plates deliver fast grilling and delicious results for steak, burgers, chicken, veggies, and more! What will you make on your George Foreman® Grill? *Up to 34% less space compared to the George Foreman GR10B, based on height**Compared to standard George Tough™ nonstick coating
